function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of contagion in residential shared facilities (kitchens, dining rooms, etc.) due to challenges with social distancing","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of contagious diseases within shared facilities","Mitigation":"Restrict number of people, ensure social distancing, and provide PPE","Technologies":"Contact tracing, ventilation systems, and UV-C sanitation","People":"Residents, visitors, facility staff","Owner":"Facility management, residents, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased pressure on electricity and water resources due to remote work and distance education","Impact":"Strain on infrastructure and resources, potential for hazardous waste from infected individuals","Mitigation":"Energy and water conservation measures, waste management protocols, and promoting sustainable practices","Technologies":"Smart home technology, renewable energy sources, and water-saving fixtures","People":"Residents, utility providers, waste management personnel","Owner":"Utility companies, local government, residents"}]}
